### Libraries
```{r}
library(sf)
library(osrm)
```


```{r}
shpFile = read_sf("/Users/johnnymosby/repos/thesis_demography/data/STATISTIK_AUSTRIA_GEM_MP_20220101/", options = "ENCODING=WINDOWS-1252")

shpFile <- st_transform(shpFile, 4326)
coordinates = st_coordinates(shpFile[, "geometry"]) |> 
    as.data.frame()
openstreetmapResponse = osrmRoute(loc = coordinates[c(1,9),])
subsetDistances = shpFile[1:2, "geometry"]
openstreetmapResponse = osrmRoute(src = coordinates[1, ], dst = coordinates[2, ])
openstreetmapResponse1 = osrmRoute(src = coordinates[1, ], dst = coordinates[2, ], osrm.server = "http://localhost:1234/")
```
